Name: Asteroidiga
About the game: Shoot 'em up with physics A single mine detonation in this bullet hell game will send you flying around the screen. But never fear! Though the enemies keep coming faster, you have a teleportation module and an arsenal of weapons to defeat them. Blast them with your machine gun , melt them with your laser and smack them silly with your shotgun . Fair warning: this game has a moderate learning curve. Play Many Game Modes Survival - Play against endless waves of enemies. Campaign - Defeat a carefully choreographed onslaught of enemies. Thermal Meltdown - Avoiding getting melted by the cosmic power. Color Defender - Pick up the right colored weapon to defeat the snakes. Dodge This - How long can you survive in space as it gets more crowded? There could be more in the future if I see significant player interest. Other Key Features Compare your score against the top 10 other players. Watch replays of your games or from the leaderboards. You can start mid-game to practice! Earn achievements when you've reached certain goals.
